channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mollick Presents The Meaning Of New Image Generation Models
item.description: The new tools for developing visuals are smarter “thinking” mode

item.title: The Wiretap: Plagued By Child Predators, Former $200 Million Whisper App Has Disappeared
item.description: Whisper was once a darling of the Silicon Valley social boom. Not any more.

item.title: Why Lifestyle Choices Could Determine Whether Or Not You Get Cancer
item.description: Nearly 2 in 5 cancers and about half of cancer deaths among adults 30 and up were tied to lifestyle factors, according to a recent study.

item.title: Samsung’s Major Free Android 15 Update Finally Arrives For Millions Of Galaxy Users
item.description: Months in the making, the release of One UI 7 with the goodness of Android 15 is almost here, but it’s not for everyone.

item.title: Building A Stronger Supply Chain: Why Trust Makes All The Difference
item.description: A "trust-based approach" can ensure a resilient supply chain that is adaptable to today’s—and tomorrow's—challenges.

item.title: This is number 10,000
item.description: Give or take. It’s hard to get the exact count through the sands of time. But it’s at least 10,000 blog posts as of today. That’s 25 years, once or tw...

item.title: An eroding sense of wonder

item.title: Hobby mindset
item.description: You might be fortunate enough to have a hobby. Something you are focused on and passionate about. You might read the journals, develop your skills, co...

item.title: We are all goofballs
item.description: When someone makes an obvious mistake, it’s tempting to label them with a term that’s dismissive or even hurtful. A label is permanent, a noun, a way ...

item.title: We can agree about schismogenesis
